name: SMRTDTA_ELEM_PAT_ENTERED
description: This table is a bridge between patient entered context SmartData element values and the source patient records.

columns.name: HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the value record.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the patient encounter contact that is associated with the SmartData element value. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the linked patient record that is associated with the SmartData element value.

columns.name: ELEMENT_ID
columns.description: The SmartData identifier (SDI) for this row.
